title: Jojo Bizarre Adventure Skin
body:
Can we get a Udyr skin having him look like Jotaro Kujo. And make his stances look like the Stand ability instead since it'd pretty much fit him perfectly. I'll pay good money if the skin is done good with nice voice lines and effects/etc.

I could just imagine Udyr going into a stance and just melee formin bitchs screaming Ora!

replies.body: only if vlad gets a dio skin

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=qm5QBE6g,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-05T20:56:37.803+0000)
>
> only if vlad gets a dio skin

Words of a genius.
